issue_place_s: East Greenwich, Rhode Island, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: TEN SHILLINGS. THE Possessor of thie BILL shall be paid, by the Treasurer of the Colony of RHODE-ISLAND, TEN SHILLINGS Lawful money, at the Rate of Six Shillings and Nine Pence for One Ounce of Silver, within Two Years from the Date hereof, with Interest at Two and an Half per Cent. per Annum until paid. -BY ORDER OF ASSEMBLY.- East-Greenwich, the Sixteenth Day of June, 1775. Xs.
issue_reverse_legend_s: 10 s. 10 s. TEN SHILLINGS. 10 s. 10 s.
